title: DDMA Recruitment 2025 - Apply for the 03 Information Assistant Posts
description: District Disaster Management Authority Sribhumi (DDMA Sribhumi) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Information Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Intermediate (10+2) can grab this chance and apply for the DDMA Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of app...
